data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea abies (Norway spruce) from sample DUVBER-62

Exposition S, Slope 30 deg, Geology: Blockschutt, Silikat, Tree line 900 m, av. Tree height 28 m, Tree cover 75%, Shrub cover 10%, Herb cover 90%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: Myrtillo-Piceetum, Film number: 527A
